qas.question: What day is presumed the Crucifixion happened?
Why do some scholars propose a Thursday is possible?

answers.text: a "double sabbath" caused by an extra Passover sabbath

qas.question: Why do some other scholars argue that it happened on a Wednesday?

answers.text: on the grounds of the mention of "three days and three nights" in Matthew

qas.question: How long was Jesus said to be in the tomb?
Was Jesus in the tomb exactly 72 hours?

answers.text: references to a resurrection on the third day do not require three literal nights
